ma_definition: The average of past prices, used to smooth price trends and identify direction.
ema_definition: Similar to MA but gives more weight to recent prices, commonly used for short-term trend analysis.
rsi_definition: Measures strength of price movement (0–100). Above 70 may indicate overbought, below 30 may indicate oversold.
macd_definition: Uses two EMAs to analyze trend changes.
dea_definition: Signal line, the average of DIF.
histogram_definition: Represents the difference between DIF and DEA, showing momentum strength.
news_image_error_detail: News image failed to load, but you can still read the headline
load_more_detail: Load more news, currently showing {{current}} of {{total}} articles
rsi_description: Measures momentum strength of price movements
ma_description: Smooths price fluctuations to identify trend direction
rsi_signal_divergence: RSI divergence: Watch for trend reversal
rsi_status_bullish: RSI in oversold zone (<30), price may bounce. Consider buying opportunities.
rsi_status_bearish: RSI in overbought zone (>70), price may pullback. Consider reducing position.
rsi_status_neutral: RSI in neutral zone (30-70), price relatively stable. Can wait and see.
rsi_status_extreme: RSI in extreme zone, potential trend reversal. Pay special attention.
macd_signal_golden: DIF crosses above DEA: Buy signal
macd_signal_death: DIF crosses below DEA: Sell signal
macd_status_bullish: MACD shows golden cross signal, DIF crosses above DEA with positive histogram, indicating buying opportunity.
macd_status_bearish: MACD shows death cross signal, DIF crosses below DEA with negative histogram, indicating selling signal.
macd_status_neutral: MACD in neutral state, DIF and DEA are close, trend unclear, recommend waiting.
macd_status_extreme: MACD shows strong signal, histogram absolute value is large, trend may continue.
ma_status_bullish: Price is above MA20 with deviation over 5%, indicating short-term bullish trend. Consider long opportunities.
ma_status_bearish: Price is below MA20 with deviation below -5%, indicating short-term bearish trend. Consider reducing positions.
ma_status_neutral: Price is close to MA20 with deviation within ±5%, trend unclear. Recommend waiting.
ma_status_extreme: Price deviates from MA20 by over 10%, possible mean reversion. Exercise caution.
kdj_signal_oversold: K, D, J < 20: Oversold zone, consider buying
kdj_signal_overbought: K, D, J > 80: Overbought zone, consider selling
kdj_signal_golden: K line crosses above D line: Golden cross buy signal
kdj_signal_death: K line crosses below D line: Death cross sell signal
kdj_status_bullish: KDJ indicator is in oversold zone (K, D, J all below 20), price may rebound. Suitable for buying.
kdj_status_bearish: KDJ indicator is in overbought zone (K, D, J all above 80), price may pullback. Recommend reducing positions.
kdj_status_neutral: KDJ indicator is in neutral zone with no clear overbought/oversold signals. Can wait for opportunities.
kdj_status_extreme: KDJ indicator is in extreme zone, possible trend reversal. Requires close attention.
bb_signal_lower: Touching lower band: Strong support, consider buying
bb_signal_upper: Touching upper band: Strong resistance, consider reducing
bb_signal_squeeze: Bandwidth squeeze: Breakout imminent, prepare for move
bb_signal_expansion: Bandwidth expansion: Trend strengthening, follow direction
bb_status_bullish: Price is touching or near lower band with strong support, potential rebound. Consider buying opportunities.
bb_status_bearish: Price is touching or near upper band with strong resistance, potential pullback. Consider reducing positions.
bb_status_neutral: Price is fluctuating near middle band with no clear support/resistance. Can wait for breakout.
bb_status_extreme: Bandwidth is squeezed to low levels, market may be preparing for breakout. Monitor direction closely.
strategy_rsi_overbought_zone: Overbought zone, watch for pullback risk
strategy_wait_golden_death_cross: Wait for golden or death cross signal
strategy_ma_price_above_ma20: Price significantly above MA20, upward trend
strategy_ma_price_below_ma20: Price significantly below MA20, downward trend
strategy_ma5_above_ma20_confirm: MA5 above MA20, short-term trend confirmed
strategy_ma5_below_ma20_confirm: MA5 below MA20, short-term trend confirmed
strategy_k_crosses_above_d: K line crosses above D line
strategy_k_crosses_below_d: K line crosses below D line
strategy_wait_cross_or_extreme: Wait for cross signal or extreme values
strategy_momentum_multiple_bullish: Multiple indicators bullish, suitable for trend following
strategy_momentum_multiple_bearish: Multiple indicators bearish, recommend reducing position or stop loss
strategy_rsi_extreme_oversold_reversal: RSI extremely oversold, good reversal opportunity
strategy_rsi_extreme_overbought_reversal: RSI extremely overbought, good reversal opportunity
strategy_macd_strong_golden_breakout: MACD strong golden cross, high upward breakout possibility
strategy_macd_strong_death_breakout: MACD strong death cross, high downward breakout risk
